actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to allow all recipients of grants for treatment works to use dedicated ad valorem taxes in order to meet the requirement of the Act that such recipients adopt user charges to pay for operation and maintenance of treatment works.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to permit all grant recipients for waste treatment works to use dedicated ad valorem taxes to satisfy the requirement that recipients adopt operation and maintenance user charges.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to allow all recipients of grants for treatment works to use dedicated ad valorem taxes in order to meet the requirement of the Act that such recipients adopt user charges to pay for operation and maintenance of treatment works.
